HomePage.title: Boyéyi malamu na Steedoo Group International
HomePage.subtitle: Bakambi ya misala ya mombongo na mokili mobimba
HomePage.description: Moninga na yo ya solo mpo na misala ya mombongo mobimba

subheading.global: Kobongola ba industries na nzela ya teknolozi, transport, mosolo, mpe ba solutions ya ba industries ya seko na Afrika mpe mosika.
subheading.us: Kotambwisa ba innovations na ba secteurs ya teknolozi, mosolo, mpe investissement na mayele ya stratégie mpe vision ya mokili mobimba.

WhoWeAre.title: Biso Nani
WhoWeAre.subtitle: Steedoo Group ezali société multinationale oyo ezali kopesa makasi na ba entreprises ya Afrika na kopesa ba stratégies ya sika mpe ya malamu mpo na kokola mpe kozala seko na ba industries nionso.
WhoWeAre.foundationDescription1: Etongami na vision ya kobongola environnement ya mombongo ya Afrika, tosangisaka mayele ya zando ya mboka na ba pratiques ya malamu ya mokili mobimba mpo na kopesa ba résultats ya kokamwa. Portfolio na biso ya ndenge na ndenge ezali na teknolozi, mosolo, transport, mpe ba secteurs ya industries.
WhoWeAre.foundationDescription2: Kobanda na ba sièges na biso ya Lubumbashi mpe Cheyenne, tozali kotambwisa ba initiatives stratégiques oyo ezali kosala valeur ya seko mpo na ba partenaires na biso, ba parties prenantes, mpe ba communautés oyo tozali kosalela.
WhoWeAre.portfolioDescription:
Ba Sociétés
ya Ndenge na Ndenge

mission.title: Mission na Biso
mission.description: Kotambwisa bokoli ya ekonomi ya seko mpe innovation na ba marchés oyo ezali kokola na nzela ya ba investissements stratégiques, ba solutions teknolozi ya sika, mpe ba services ya développement ya mombongo mobimba.

vision.title: Vision na Biso
vision.description: Kozala catalyseur principal ya transformation industrielle mpe développement économique na Afrika, wana tozali kotonga ba ponts kati ya ba marchés oyo ezali kokola mpe ba opportunités ya mokili mobimba.

corporateDevelopment.title: Développement ya Société
corporateDevelopment.description: Développement stratégique ya mombongo, ba stratégies ya kokota na zando, mpe restructuration ya société mpo na bokoli ya seko na ba marchés ya Afrika.

investmentManagement.title: Gestion ya Investissement
investmentManagement.description: Optimisation ya portfolio, capital-risque, mpe ba investissements stratégiques na ba secteurs ya bokoli makasi na teknolozi mpe ba marchés industriels.

strategicConsulting.title: Conseil Stratégique
strategicConsulting.description: Conseil ya gestion, excellence opérationnelle, mpe ba stratégies ya transformation oyo ebongisami mpo na ba environnements ya mombongo ya Afrika.

innovationAdvisory.title: Conseil ya Innovation
innovationAdvisory.description: Adoption ya teknolozi, transformation numérique, mpe développement ya stratégie ya innovation mpo na ba industries ya kala mpe ya sika.

marketIntelligence.title: Intelligence ya Zando
marketIntelligence.description: Recherche ya zando mobimba, analyse ya concurrence, mpe intelligence ya mombongo mpo na kozwa ba décisions ya malamu.

regulatoryCompliance.title: Conformité Réglementaire
regulatoryCompliance.description: Lisungi mobimba ya conformité réglementaire, assistance ya licence, mpe navigation ya cadre juridique na ba juridictions ebele.

financialAdvisory.title: Conseil Financier
financialAdvisory.description: Planification financière mobimba, gestion ya bozwi, mpe ba services ya conseil ya investissement mpo na bato mpe ba sociétés.

maAdvisory.title: Conseil M&A
maAdvisory.description: Conseil ya fusion mpe acquisition, diligence raisonnable, mpe conseil ya transaction mpo na ba combinaisons ya mombongo stratégiques.

internationalExpansion.title: Expansion Internationale
internationalExpansion.description: Guidance stratégique mpo na ba sociétés ya États-Unis oyo ezali koluka kokola na ba marchés ya Afrika mpe ba opportunités ya mokili mobimba.

technologySolutions.title: Ba Solutions Teknolozi
technologySolutions.description: Ba implementations teknolozi personnalisées, transformation numérique, mpe ba solutions ya cybersécurité mpo na ba entreprises ya lelo.

About.title: Na Ntina ya Steedoo Group
About.subtitle: Corporation mondiale diversifiée oyo ezali kotambwisa innovation mpe bokoli ya seko na ba secteurs industriels ebele na Afrika mpe mosika.
About.overviewDescription: Steedoo Group etelemi lokola mwinda ya innovation mpe excellence stratégique na paysage ya mombongo ya mokili mobimba. Engagement na biso ya kolendisa développement durable na ba marchés oyo ezali kokola esali ete tozala partenaire ya kozala na confiance mpo na ba organisations oyo ezali koluka bokoli ya transformation.
About.approachDescription: Tozali kondima na makasi ya ba partenariats stratégiques mpe innovation collaborative. Approche na biso multidisciplinaire esangisaka connaissance profonde ya industrie na teknolozi ya sika mpo na kopesa ba solutions oyo ezali kosala impact oyo ekoki komekama.
About.presenceDescription: Na ba opérations oyo ezali kopanzana na ba continents mibale, tozali kosalela position na biso unique mpo na kotonga ba ponts kati ya ba marchés ya Afrika mpe ba investisseurs ya mokili mobimba, kolendisa collaboration transfrontalière mpe développement durable.
About.ourIndustrySectors: Ba Secteurs na Biso ya Industries
About.licensedCompliantOperations: Ba opérations na licence mpe oyo ezali kolanda mibeko

dnbListed.title: Listé na D&B
dnbListed.description: Etaliami mpe elisté na répertoire ya mombongo ya Dun & Bradstreet

fullyCompliant.title: Conformité Mobimba
fullyCompliant.description: Ezali kosala na ba licences nionso esengeli mpe ba approbations réglementaires

globalReach.title: Portée Mondiale
globalReach.description: Ba opérations oyo ezali kopanzana na Afrika mpe Amérique ya Nord

Industries.title: Ba Industries Oyo Tosalelaka
Industries.subtitle: Kotambwisa innovation na ba secteurs ndenge na ndenge na expertise stratégique mpe vision ya mokili mobimba.
Industries.technologyDescription: Ba solutions ya transformation numérique, développement ya logiciel, mpe infrastructure teknolozi mpo na ba entreprises modernes na Afrika mobimba.
Industries.transportationDescription: Ba solutions intégrées ya logistique mpe mobilité oyo ezali kokangisa ba communautés mpe ba entreprises na nzela ya ba réseaux ya transport ya mabele, mpepo mpe mai.
Industries.financeDescription: Ba services financiers stratégiques mpe ba solutions bancaires oyo ezali kosoutenir bokoli économique mpe inclusion financière na ba marchés oyo ezali kokola.
Industries.investmentDescription: Gestion ya portfolio stratégique mpe ba opportunités ya capital-risque, kotambwisa développement économique mpe ba initiatives ya bokoli ya mombongo.
Industries.industrialDescription: Production, traitement, transformation, mpe commercialisation ya ba produits mpe ba substances industrielles na conformité réglementaire mobimba.
Industries.licensedCapabilitiesDescription: Ezali kosala na se ya RCCM: CD/LSH/RCCM/21-B-00576 na licence mobimba mpo na ba activités nionso réglementées.

Portfolio.title: Portfolio na Biso
Portfolio.subtitle: Ba investissements stratégiques mpe ba ventures na ba secteurs ya teknolozi, transport, mosolo, mpe industries.

technologyVentures.title: Ba Ventures Teknolozi
technologyVentures.description: Investissement na ba sociétés teknolozi oyo ezali kokola mpe ba initiatives ya transformation numérique.

industrialProjects.title: Ba Projets Industriels
industrialProjects.description: Production, traitement, mpe commercialisation ya ba produits mpe ba matériaux industriels.

strategicPartnerships.title: Ba Partenariats Stratégiques
strategicPartnerships.description: Ba ventures collaboratives na ba leaders ya industrie mpe ba joueurs ya marchés oyo ezali kokola.

form.title: Tindela Biso Message
form.subject: Sujet
form.success: Matondo mpo na message na yo. Tokozongisela yo eyano kala mingi te!
form.error: Ezalaki na problème ya kotinda message na yo. Meka lisusu.

placeholders.message: Yebisa biso na ntina ya demande na yo...

info.description: Soki ozali na intérêt na ba services na biso, ozali koluka ba opportunités ya partenariat, to ozali na ba questions générales, tolingi koyoka yo.

ResearchProcessing.title: Recherche mpe Traitement
ResearchProcessing.subtitle: Ba capacités mobimba na production, recherche, exploitation, traitement, transformation, mpe commercialisation ya ba produits mpe ba substances.
ResearchProcessing.description: Kosalela ba techniques ya recherche ya sika mpe ba technologies ya traitement mpo na kopesa ba insights oyo ekoki kosalelama mpo na kozwa ba décisions stratégiques.
ResearchProcessing.capabilityDescription: Ba opérations na licence mpe oyo ezali kolanda mibeko na approbation réglementaire mobimba.

regulatory.title: Conformité Réglementaire
regulatory.description1: Ezali kosala na se ya RCCM: CD/LSH/RCCM/21-B-00576 na licence mobimba mpo na ba activités nionso oyo ezali na production, recherche, exploitation, traitement, transformation, mpe commercialisation ya ba produits mpe ba substances.
regulatory.description2: Ba opérations na biso ezali kobatela makasi ba normes ya environnement, sécurité, mpe qualité na ba secteurs nionso.

OurCompanies.title: Ba Sociétés na Biso
OurCompanies.subtitle: Portfolio na biso ya ba sociétés innovantes ezali kobongola ba industries mpe kosala valeur durable na Afrika mobimba mpe mosika.
OurCompanies.comingSoon: Ba sociétés mosusu ezali koya kala mingi te

WhyChooseUs.title: Mpo na Nini Opona Biso
WhyChooseUs.subtitle: Mona oyo esali ete tozala ndenge mosusu lokola partenaire na yo ya kozala na confiance mpo na succès ya mombongo.

globalExperience.title: Expérience Mondiale
globalExperience.description: Koleka ba mbula 3 ya expertise na ba continents mpe ba industries ebele.

localKnowledge.title: Connaissance Locale
localKnowledge.description: Compréhension profonde ya ba marchés ya Afrika mpe ba environnements ya mombongo.

innovativeSolutions.title: Ba Solutions Innovantes
innovativeSolutions.description: Teknolozi ya sika mpe ba approches créatives mpo na kosilisa ba défis difficiles.

provenResults.title: Ba Résultats Prouvés
provenResults.description: Historique ya succès na livraison ya ba projets mpe création ya valeur.

strategicPartnership.title: Partenariat Stratégique
strategicPartnership.description: Ba relations ya tango molai oyo etongami na confiance mpe succès mutuel.

comprehensiveSupport.title: Support Complet
comprehensiveSupport.description: Ba services ya ebandeli tii na suka kobanda na conception tii na implémentation mpe mosika.

Leadership.title: Équipe ya Leadership
Leadership.subtitle: Kutana na ba professionnels expérimentés oyo bazali kotambwisa vision mpe bokoli na biso

CookieConsent.title: Ba Paramètres ya Ba Cookies
CookieConsent.description: Tozali kosalela ba cookies mpo na kopersonaliser ba contenus, kotinda ba pubs, mpe ko-analyser trafic.

preferences.title: Ba Préférences ya Ba Cookies
preferences.description: Bongola ba préférences na yo ya ba cookies. Okoki kobongola ba paramètres oyo na tango nyonso.

necessary.title: Oyo Esengeli
necessary.description: Epesaka sécurité mpe ba fonctionnalités ya moboko.
necessary.details: Ba cookies oyo ezali essentiel mpo na site web esala malamu. Ezali na ba cookies ya session, authentication mpe sécurité.

preferences.title: Ba Préférences
preferences.description: Epesaka ba contenus mpe ba paramètres personnalisés.
preferences.details: Ba cookies oyo ekanisaka ba préférences na yo lokola ba paramètres ya monoko, boponi ya région, mpe ba préférences ya thème.

analytics.title: Analytiques
analytics.details: Ba cookies oyo esalisaka biso kososola ndenge nini ba visiteurs basalaka na site na biso na kosangisa ba informations anonymes na ntina ya ba pages oyo bamonaka mpe etamboli ya ba usagers.

marketing.title: Marketing
marketing.description: Epesaka personalisation ya ba publicités mpe kolanda.
marketing.details: Ba cookies oyo esalemaka mpo na kolakisa yo ba publicités ya malamu mpe komeka efficacité ya ba campagnes na biso ya marketing.
